channel.title: Tor Browser infinite tab opening when enabling TOR_TRANSPROXY when using it with a VPN
channel.description: Is there a fix for the infinite tab opening TBB does when enabling TOR_TRANSPROXY when using it with a VPN? This is triggered if I or the website open a new tab by unintentionally.

item.title: Tor Browser infinite tab opening when enabling TOR_TRANSPROXY when using it with a VPN
item.dc:creator: HulaHoop
item.description:
Yep setting extensions.torbutton.launch_warning to false fixes this. I need to document this on the wiki.

EDIT:

Changes added. let me know if there are other relevant pages that need this added

Whonix â€“ 6 Nov 21

Template:Tor Browser Remove Proxy Settings
